The Conversation (theconversation.com) | Senior Full-Stack Rails Developer | Boston | REMOTE & ONSITE https://jobs.theconversation.com/jobs/17692-senior-ruby-deve...

The Conversation is an independent, non-profit source of research-based fact-backed news and analysis.

Our articles are written by academics collaborating with our editors using the TCMG platform - a Realtime Collaborative Editorial Platform & CMS.

Since our launch in 2011, We now have offices in Australia, the UK, the US, Africa and France.
